meanings.definition: Lewdest (adjective): characterized by or inciting to lechery; lustful
meanings.sent1: The lewdest man in town always made inappropriate comments.
meanings.sent2: She gave him a lewdest look, full of desire.
meanings.sent3: The lewdest joke at the party had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: His lewdest thoughts were like a wild fire, consuming his mind.
meanings.sent5: The lewdest scene in the movie made everyone blush.

meanings.definition: Lewdest (adverb): in a lewd manner; obscenely
meanings.sent1: He whispered lewdest to her, making her cheeks turn red.
meanings.sent2: The comedian told jokes lewdest, causing some to gasp.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed lewdest when it wanted attention.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled lewdest through the night, creating an eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The singer sang lewdest, shocking the audience.
